page.title: 02Media
page.content: Local news in{Bethlehem}has been very exciting this year,the{W.I}have been coming to school as always for meetings.{Sir Harry Secombe}came Christmas time to film the school singing with him and we appeared on the{Highway Special}the Sunday before Christmas.We sang{O Dawel Ddinas {Bethlehem.}In english it is O Little Town of Bethlehem.{TV-AM}also came to film us singing O Little Town of Bethlehem.To complete the scene {Breakfast Time}also filmed us, we were shown singing on three Television chanels.{H.T.V.}inviated the school to take part in a welsh quize called Teuluffon in Cardiff.The name of the place we went to was Culverhouse Cross where people phone in and win prizes. Mr. Walters and Kevin the bus driver took part in the quiz.
